item.title: Go CPU profiling
item.description: Let’s take a look to Go CPU profiling tools to optimize the mandelbrot set calculation from previous post.

item.title: Mandelbrot Set Calculation
item.description: The Mandelbrot set is one of the most famous fractals and it is really simple to draw. Personally I enjoy a lot seeing how simple rules lead to complex patterns.

item.title: Create a Blog Like This
item.description: A blog like this can be generated with Hugo.io hosted for free using Github.com.

item.title: Why This Blog
item.description: I’m starting this blog to have feedback of my improvement over time.

item.title: About Me
item.description: About MetalBlueberry I’m a passionate developer moving toward the specialization in IoT technologies. I feel comfortable working with Python and Go as most of my recent development time has been invested with those two languages but I have experience with other popular languages such as C/C++, C# and Java. I’ve experience with several technologies from the IoT world from the sensors to the cloud infrastructure. Sensoring: Arduino/ Raspberry Pi Transport: MQTT, HTTP, TCP/UDP Processing: Python Pandas Storage formats: Parquet, csv, json, xml… Analysis: SQL, Python Pandas, Jupyter Notebook Provider: REST API, Plotly Dash, PowerBI I’m also learning AWS services.
